text: "In Repair" is a 2000 alternative rock song by the Canadian alternative rock band Our Lady Peace and is the first single from their fourth studio album Spiritual Machines, which was released in 2000. The song was written by Raine Maida and was produced by Arnold Lanni. ==Meaning of the song== Category:Our Lady Peace songs Category:2000 songs
title: In Repair (Our Lady Peace song)
